That oddly tell reminds me - we used to have this elderly lady that came by basically every other day and asked for free samples. It was known she was capable of grocery shopping for herself and all, she just took advantage of the free sample thing a bit
one free sample and goaway :u
Well, we haven‚Äôt seen her in months now, and it‚Äôs been brought up that she may have passed cause she hadn‚Äôt been banned yet
and if it became an everyday thing, I'd have restricted her from getting any at all.
We had a group of kids that do something similar
I'd feel the same to them
it's a store, not a free buffet

Only they asked for big stuff like whole chicken breasts. Now, while we‚Äôll portion out some stuff for the sole idea of sampling, they started getting ridiculous cause we knew they were together but it was a different kid each time
They‚Äôre close to being banned from samples

For example

He‚Äôd then go over to another area of the store, eat the stuff, and stash the wrappers, bags, containers, etc
When they brought us the labels to scan and put in the system to throw away (this was causing shrink and inventory inaccuracies)
